coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A single shot of espresso added to a cup of hot water.

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: Strong concentration of black coffe made in an espresso machine by forcing steam through pressurized coffee beans. This drink contains no milk.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: Three equal parts of steamed milk, foamed milk, and espresso. You can add flavoring syrups to make vanilla, caramel, ou hazelnut cappuccinos.

coffees.name: Cafe Latte
coffees.description: One part espresso with three parts steamed milk with froth on top.

coffees.name: Macchiato
coffees.description: Espresso with a dollop os steamed milk added in a 4:1 ratio.

coffees.name: Iced coffee
coffees.description: Brewed coffee served over ice with sugar and milk.

coffees.name: Ice Latte
coffees.description: An iced latte is a chilled coffee beverage that's made by mixing espresso with chilled milk, simple syrup, and ice cubes.

coffees.name: Ice Americano
coffees.description: An Iced Americano is an Americano served over ice: espresso, cold water (optional), and ice.

coffees.name: Ice Mocha
coffees.description: An iced mocha typically combines cold brew with milk and chocolate flavoring.
